name: AVCaptureDevice.LensStabilizationStatus
desc: Constants that indicate the status of optical image stabilization hardware during a bracketed photo capture.

items.name: case unsupported
items.desc: Lens stabilization isn’t available on the device or device configuration that captured this photo.

items.name: case off
items.desc: Lens stabilization isn’t specified for this photo capture.

items.name: case active
items.desc: Lens stabilization was active for the full duration of the photo capture.

items.name: case outOfRange
items.desc: Lens stabilization was enabled for the photo capture, but device motion or capture duration exceeded the stabilization module’s correction limits.

items.name: case unavailable
items.desc: Lens stabilization was temporarily unavailable during the photo capture.
